author: Like Stories of Old
description:
Start your free month of great cinema now at https://mubi.com/likestoriesofold 

Hollywood liberalism is ready to save the world, or at least; in their own self-constructed fantasies. In reality though, the tropes that have emerged in these movies are actually what we need to get rid off.
